title: 1Weather Pro - Local Forecast, Radar v2.0.2
description:
1Weather is the most loved weather app on Google Play. At 4.6 stars, no weather app has a higher rating among users. And reviewers have heaped on the praise as well.
Why do they love it? In a word Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Design. The app has a simple, yet beautiful interface that makes getting the weather elegant and fun. This UI, combined with a powerful set of weather tools, makes this app #1.
When it comes to weather apps, you have lots of choices, so why not choose the best? Download 1Weather and judge for yourself.

FEATURES:
Ã‚Â· Real-time local weather and forecasts for virtually any location around the world (Current + 48-hour)
Ã‚Â· 7-day extended forecast and precipitation info
Ã‚Â· Hourly forecast and precipitation info
Ã‚Â· Follow my location - Updated weather when you are on the move
Ã‚Â· LIVE animated radar and extreme weather warnings (US only) with layers
. Added Enhanced Cloud Layer for International locations on Radar Screen 
Ã‚Â· Animated sunrise, sunset, and Lunar phase (Phones only)
Ã‚Â· Save multiple locations to access quickly and easily
Ã‚Â· Gorgeous widgets (3 on phones, 4 on tablets) you can add to your home screen
Ã‚Â· Share weather information (including screenshots and alert text) with friends and family via email, text, Twitter, Facebook, Google+, etc.
Ã‚Â· Customize with multiple weather theme backgrounds or use your own custom background
Ã‚Â· True server push alerts for NWS supported locations with configurable notification options by location and alert level
Ã‚Â· Configurable Ongoing notification showing the current conditions for a location of your choice
Ã‚Â· DashClock integration allowing you to select a location of your choice
Note: We have removed sensitive log permissions.
